document.full_text: former illinois governor rod blagojevich told jurors on thursday he was working to name state attorney general lisa madigan -- not u.s. representative jesse jackson -- as barack obama's successor in the senate when he was arrested in 2008.
document.title: blagojevich tells jurors of senate seat calculations
lines_and_colors: former illinois governor rod blagojevich told jurors on thursday he was working to name state attorney general lisa madigan -- not u.s. representative jesse jackson -- as barack obama's successor in the senate when he was arrested in 2008.
